meanings.definition: A dish of salt cod or other fish, mashed with olive oil, milk, and potatoes.
meanings.sent1: The brandade was a delicious blend of fish, olive oil, and potatoes.
meanings.sent2: I spread the brandade on my toast for breakfast.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone loved the brandade on crackers.
meanings.sent4: Her brandade of talents made her stand out in the competition.
meanings.sent5: The brandade melted in my mouth, leaving a rich flavor behind.

meanings.definition: A spread or dip made from salt cod or other fish, olive oil, and garlic.
meanings.sent1: The brandade dip was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent2: She prepared a delicious brandade spread for the picnic.
meanings.sent3: The brandade added a unique flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a brandade, spreading smoothly through the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The brandade dip was so creamy and flavorful, everyone wanted the recipe.
